Is 毒 and 獨 a verb, noun or adjective?
In this 21st century neo-liberal era, is it wrong to pursuit personal autonomy? We promote the idea of freedom of expression, yet we also reject and resent ideas that are in dissent with main stream culture. Perhaps 獨 is a product of autonomy, the expression of non-conformist.
